message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with image denoising, which is a common problem in computer vision and image processing. The proposed method involves using a targeted database to find relevant patches for denoising, which suggests a focus on computer vision and image processing techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also formulates the denoising problem as an optimal filter design problem, which involves optimization and statistical analysis, suggesting a focus on information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also demonstrates applications in text images, multiview images, and face images, which suggests a focus on multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
